title: Solid Code. Direct Collaboration.
body: I’m Alex, a solo web developer based in Italy. I sit right in that sweet spot between a creative designer and a technical engineer. My philosophy is simple: I handle the complex technology so you can focus on running your business. I don’t run a massive agency with account managers or hidden fees; I keep my operation small and focused. This means when we work together, you get direct access to the person actually building your product. I build using modern standards like React and TypeScript. In plain English? That means your website isn't just a static picture; it’s a stable, scalable application that loads instantly and doesn't break under pressure. I use tools like Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion to ensure the design is bespoke and feels premium, without the bloat of heavy templates. I’m not chasing the biggest corporate contracts. I’m looking for partners who value clear communication, honest work, and a website that is built to last.
